headline: Countdown to Halliburton (HAL) Q3 Earnings: A Look at Estimates Beyond Revenue and EPS
summary: Looking beyond Wall Street's top-and-bottom-line estimate forecasts for Halliburton (HAL), delve into some of its key metrics to gain a deeper insight into the company's potential performance for the quarter ended September 2025.

headline: Halliburton, Aker BP execute umbilical-less tubing hanger installation on NCS
summary: The digital hydraulic control and OTHOS enabled the accurate installation and alignment of the vertical Christmas Tree tubing hanger.
